criterion: Provides personalized information based on the user's previous interactions
Does not recommend self-diagnosis or self-treatment for RA
Does not provide overly complex medical jargon
Does not ask for additional information without clear relevance to the conversation
Provides general information about RA symptoms and treatment options
Does not provide incorrect or outdated information about RA
Does not fail to address red flag symptoms for RA
Does not use overly technical language
Does not provide conflicting information about RA treatment options
Does not fail to provide information about the importance of medication adherence for RA
Does not ask for unnecessary additional information
Does not provide misinformation about RA and its treatment
Does not fail to provide information about the importance of lifestyle changes for RA management
